text: The 2015 season was PDRM FA's 1st season in the Malaysia Super League after having been promoted from the Malaysia Premier League as champions.Pasukan Bolasepak PDRM FA perkenal jentera Liga Super 2015; The Official Portal of Royal Malaysia Police, 2 February 2015 == Kit and sponsorship == * Kit Supplier: Line Seven * Sponsor: Perkasa Jauhari == Coaching staff == {| class="wikitable" |- !
